name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Open Haiku Reader and read me a haiku”
”Ask Haiku Reader what poems they have today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Just ask Alexa and let Haiku Reader spark your creativity. She will read her favorite haiku's whenever you'd like.

Here are some things you can say:

Ask Haiku Reader:
...to read me a haiku
...what poems they have today
...to share a poem

Use Haiku Reader:
...to read me something
...to give me a poem
